segment.source: Import and Export VAMT Data (Windows 10)
segment.target: Import and Export VAMT Data (Windows 10)

segment.source: Import and Export VAMT Data
segment.target: Import and Export VAMT Data

segment.source: Import and Export VAMT Data
segment.target: Import and Export VAMT Data

segment.source: You can use the Volume Activation Management Tool (VAMT) to import product-activation data from a Computer Information List (.cilx or .cil) file into SQL Server, and to export product-activation data into a .cilx file.
segment.target: You can use the Volume Activation Management Tool (VAMT) to import product-activation data from a Computer Information List (.cilx or .cil) file into SQL Server, and to export product-activation data into a .cilx file.

segment.source: A .cilx file is an XML file that stores computer and product-activation data.
segment.target: A .cilx file is an XML file that stores computer and product-activation data.

segment.source: You can import data or export data during the following scenarios:
segment.target: You can import data or export data during the following scenarios:

segment.source: Import and merge data from previous versions of VAMT.
segment.target: Import and merge data from previous versions of VAMT.

segment.source: Export data to use to perform proxy activations.
segment.target: Export data to use to perform proxy activations.

segment.source: Warning
segment.target: Warning

segment.source: Editing a .cilx file using an application other than VAMT can corrupt the .cilx file and is not supported.
segment.target: Editing a .cilx file using an application other than VAMT can corrupt the .cilx file and is not supported.

segment.source: Import VAMT Data
segment.target: Import VAMT Data

segment.source: To import data into VAMT
segment.target: To import data into VAMT

segment.source: Open VAMT.
segment.target: Open VAMT.

segment.source: In the right-side Actions pane, click Import list to open the Import List dialog box.
segment.target: In the right-side Actions pane, click Import list to open the Import List dialog box.

segment.source: In the Import List dialog box, navigate to the .cilx file location, select the file, and click Open.
segment.target: In the Import List dialog box, navigate to the .cilx file location, select the file, and click Open.

segment.source: In the Volume Activation Management Tool dialog box, click OK to begin the import.
segment.target: In the Volume Activation Management Tool dialog box, click OK to begin the import.

segment.source: VAMT displays a progress message while the file is being imported.
segment.target: VAMT displays a progress message while the file is being imported.

segment.source: Click OK when a message appears and confirms that the import has completed successfully.
segment.target: Click OK when a message appears and confirms that the import has completed successfully.

segment.source: Export VAMT Data
segment.target: Export VAMT Data

segment.source: Exporting VAMT data from a non-Internet-connected VAMT host computer is the first step of proxy activation using multiple VAMT hosts.
segment.target: Exporting VAMT data from a non-Internet-connected VAMT host computer is the first step of proxy activation using multiple VAMT hosts.

segment.source: To export product-activation data to a .cilx file:
segment.target: To export product-activation data to a .cilx file:

segment.source: In the left-side pane, you can click a product you want to export data for, or click Products if the list contains data for all products.
segment.target: In the left-side pane, you can click a product you want to export data for, or click Products if the list contains data for all products.

segment.source: If you want to export only part of the data in a product list, in the product list view in the center pane select the products you want to export.
segment.target: If you want to export only part of the data in a product list, in the product list view in the center pane select the products you want to export.

segment.source: In the right-side Actions pane on, click Export list to open the Export List dialog box.
segment.target: In the right-side Actions pane on, click Export list to open the Export List dialog box.

segment.source: In the Export List dialog box, click Browse to navigate to the .cilx file.
segment.target: In the Export List dialog box, click Browse to navigate to the .cilx file.

segment.source: Under Export options, select one of the following data-type options:
segment.target: Under Export options, select one of the following data-type options:

segment.source: Export products and product keys
segment.target: Export products and product keys

segment.source: Export products only
segment.target: Export products only

segment.source: Export proxy activation data only.
segment.target: Export proxy activation data only.

segment.source: Selecting this option ensures that the export contains only the licensing information required for the proxy web service to obtain CIDs from Microsoft.
segment.target: Selecting this option ensures that the export contains only the licensing information required for the proxy web service to obtain CIDs from Microsoft.

segment.source: No Personally Identifiable Information (PII) is contained in the exported .cilx file when this selection is checked.
segment.target: No Personally Identifiable Information (PII) is contained in the exported .cilx file when this selection is checked.

segment.source: If you have selected products to export, select the Export selected product rows only check box.
segment.target: If you have selected products to export, select the Export selected product rows only check box.

segment.source: Click Save.
segment.target: Click Save.

segment.source: VAMT displays a progress message while the data is being exported.
segment.target: VAMT displays a progress message while the data is being exported.

segment.source: Click OK when a message appears and confirms that the export has completed successfully.
segment.target: Click OK when a message appears and confirms that the export has completed successfully.
